channel.title: One big help topic (post your questions here)
channel.description:
I have seen one of these before, and i have seen allot of people struggling over nothing.... instead of flaming this category with small little questions ask them here... this will probably get locked but i want to help everyone before it does. I know allot about port forwarding with a linksys router. I have been helping out most people in the help category as i could, so please post and ill get back yo you
[size=10pt]Note::[/size] I'm currently running a server so if i don't respond right away my internet is just a little laggy, but i will help as soon as i see it
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2007, 12:14:13 PM[/size][hr]no one needs help.... i see a ton of people posting help
